column5: Well just a quick report and a nice smallie !!! Fished another full day in the pouring rain and still getting lots of very nice smallies !!! Here is one of the better ones from yesterday !!! Spinnerbait & jerkbait still the go to baits for sure !!!
nice Shawn, putting fish in the boat, as usual  I miss it up there

Nice I love cold wwather small mouth fishin. often slowing down is difficult after fishin all summer but i find a slow presentation will trigger just as many big hits. I switch to the livetarget baitball cranks and twister tail amd tube jigs with 1/8 oz for the fall smallmouth.  Slow and deliberate presentation with slow small movements..
Nice. I landed a 5lb smallie today on a spinnerbait. We were on pigeon,  fun day in the rain.
Nice bronze Shawn.  The wind pushed me off Simcoe early yesterday. Hope to get out this morning.
nice piggy  sad I wasnt up on GB this weekend!  Pigeon and buckhorn hold some nice piggies for sure.

Thanks for the report fishndevil.  I wasn't able to make it up to 'the lake' last weekend, but the weather pattern looked really good for the weekend.  Stable all week and Sunday was the last day before the cold front.  Looks like you used a swammer as the trailer.  Good idea!  Only ever used twister tails.  Will give my swammer's a go.
i dunno how u guys got out yesterday w. the winds...
Well I was fishing in a 20ft Lund pro v so it doesn't matter what the wind is doing but ya it was blowing big time !!! The wind just turns the big brown fish on even more !!!

Well I was fishing in a 20ft Lund pro v so it doesn't matter what the wind is doing but ya it was blowing big time !!! The wind just turns the big brown fish on even more !!!   That,s just a wee bit larger then my toon. LOL
damn my next boat is a 21footer for sure should be a step up from my current 16'
